name: Project 3 - Tenniswood
description:
Start your journey up the mountain with a spirit flame.

Perform a ritual by dragging powder (Colour Cubes) into the first fire pit, which will start a flame, walk over the pit to collect the flame and start heading along the path up the mountain.

Use fire pits along the path to add more life to your flame until you reach the top of the mountain. Good Luck!
